Name: Advanced Final Attack
Desc:
Permanently increases Attack, and significantly increases Final Attack's activation rate and damage.
Required Skill: Lv. 20 Final Attack

H.Old: Permanently increases Attack +30. [Final Attack Typed Skill] Attacks create a 75% chance of casting Final Attack that inflicts 95% damage 4 times.
H.New:
Permanently increases ATT +30
[Final Attack Type Skill] Attacks create a 75% chance of Final Attack that attacks at 95% Damage 4 times.
